product_overview: Noori Emaan Digital Portal is a bilingual Madrasa Management System designed to facilitate staff and attendance management with professional UI/UX and language support for Urdu and English. It includes secure authentication, a dynamic dashboard, and responsive sidebar navigation, aiming to streamline madrasa administrative tasks.
core_goals: Provide secure and user-friendly login with multilingual support and font customization.
Offer a comprehensive dashboard featuring welcome messaging, clock with Hijri date, and key statistics.
Implement a professional and collapsible sidebar with staff navigation, language switching, and logout.
Display detailed bilingual staff lists with contact information in a visually appealing format.
Support full Urdu and English internationalization including RTL and LTR text direction.
Prepare placeholders for future features like student management and attendance tracking modules.
key_features: Authentication system with form validation, language switch, and protected routes.
Dashboard with welcome banner, digital clock showing Hijri date, and stats cards layout.
Sidebar navigation with staff dropdown menu, language switch, and collapse functionality.
Staff list table showing 22 members with bilingual names and emails.
Internationalization support with Urdu and English translations and automatic RTL/LTR switching.
Developer intro animation on app load for engaging user experience.
Routing configured with React Router DOM for public and protected routes.
user_flow_summary: User accesses the login page, selects preferred language, and enters credentials to authenticate.
Upon successful login, user is redirected to the dashboard displaying personalized welcome, clock, and stats.
User navigates through sidebar menu to access staff list or placeholder pages for students and attendance.
User can switch language anytime via sidebar and the UI updates accordingly with RTL/LTR support.
User can collapse or expand the sidebar for a customized view and use staff dropdown for quicker access.
User logs out via sidebar, terminating session and redirecting to login page.
validation_criteria: Login form validates input fields and restricts unauthorized access to protected routes.
Bilingual interface seamlessly switches languages including text direction changes.
Dashboard displays real-time clock with correct Hijri date and accurate user welcome info.
Staff list renders all 22 members with correct bilingual names and email addresses in styled table.
Sidebar functions correctly allowing collapse, language switch, staff menu navigation, and logout.
App routing enforces authentication protecting dashboard and other secured pages.
Developer intro animation runs on app load without impeding performance.
